content:
{"settings":"{
  // NOTE: remember to always change the repeat rate and friction of the keyboard in the OS's keyboard settings. Low delay for repeting and fast repetting is best for snapiness

  // CUSTOM THEME COLORS
  "workbench.colorCustomizations": {
    "statusbar.debuggingbackground": "#000000",
    "statusbar.debuggingforeground": "#ffffff",
    "statusBar.foreground": "#ffffff",
    "statusBar.border": "#000000",
    "statusBar.background": "#000000",
    "editor.background": "#dfdfdf",
    "editor.selectionBackground": "#cee3ff",
    "statusBar.noFolderBackground": "#005f5f",
    "statusBar.debuggingBackground": "#005f5f",
    "statusBar.debuggingForeground": "#ffffff"
  },

  // TOKENS

  "editor.tokenColorCustomizations": {
    "textMateRules": [
      // SYSTEM BLUE
      {
        "scope": [
          "entity.name.tag",
          "support.class.component",
          "support.class.component.js",
          "entity.name.function.js",
          "storage.type.js",
          "meta.var.expr.js",
          "keyword.control.flow",
          "keyword.control",
          "keyword.control.import",
          "keyword.control.default",
          "keyword.control.export",
          "constant.language",
          "punctuation.definition.template-expression",
          "storage.type.function.js"
        ],
        "settings": {
          "foreground": "#007bfe"
        }
      },

      // RED
      {
        "scope": ["entity.name.function.js"],
        "settings": {
          "foreground": "#b60202"
        }
      },

      // PURPLE (THE PPPEOPPPLE)
      {
        "scope": [
          "variable.parameter.js",
          "meta.parameter.object-binding-pattern.js",
          "meta.parameters.js",
          "variable.other.property.js",
          "entity.other.attribute-name"
        ],
        "settings": {
          "foreground": "#8c01b3"
        }
      },

      // BLACK
      {
        "scope": [
          "variable.other.constant.js",
          "meta.definition.variable.js",
          "meta.var-single-variable.expr.js",
          "meta.var.expr.js",
          "variable.other.object.js",
          "constant.numeric",
          "meta.jsx punctuation.definition.tag",
          "punctuation.section.embedded",
          "punctuation.definition.tag"
        ],
        "settings": {
          "foreground": "#000000"
        }
      },

      // GREEN
      {
        "scope": [
          "string",
          "support.type.property-name.json.comments",
          "string.json.comments",
          "meta.structure.dictionary.json.comments",
          "meta.structure.array.json.comments",
          "meta.structure.dictionary.value.json.comments",
          "meta.structure.dictionary.json.comments",
          "meta.structure.dictionary.value.json.comments",
          "meta.structure.dictionary.json.comments",
          "source.json.comments",
          "foreground",
          "source.json",
          "meta.structure.dictionary.json",
          "meta.structure.dictionary.value.json",
          "meta.structure.dictionary.json",
          "meta.structure.dictionary.value.json",
          "meta.structure.dictionary.json",
          "support.type.property-name.json"
        ],
        "settings": {
          "foreground": "#03b149"
        }
      }
    ]
  },

  // GENERAL CONFIGS
  "editor.cursorSmoothCaretAnimation": "off",
  "editor.tabCompletion": "off",
  "editor.parameterHints.enabled": false,
  "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 18,
  "editor.codeLens": false,
  "editor.fontLigatures": true,
  "editor.fontWeight": "normal",
  // "editor.fontFamily": "Departure Mono",
  "editor.fontFamily": "JetBrains Mono",
  "editor.glyphMargin": false,
  "editor.multiCursorModifier": "ctrlCmd",
  "editor.columnSelection": false,
  "editor.renderWhitespace": "none",
  "editor.renderControlCharacters": true,
  "editor.formatOnType": true,
  "editor.mouseWheelZoom": true,
  "extensions.ignoreRecommendations": false,
  "debug.terminal.clearBeforeReusing": true,
  //SCROLL BAR
  "editor.scrollbar.horizontal": "hidden",
  // "editor.scrollbar.vertical": "hidden",
  "editor.scrollbar.verticalScrollbarSize": 8,
  "editor.scrollbar.horizontalScrollbarSize": 8,
  "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open",
  "workbench.startupEditor": "none",
  "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
  "workbench.sideBar.location": "left",
  "zenMode.centerLayout": false,
  "workbench.editor.splitInGroupLayout": "vertical",
  "zenMode.hideStatusBar": false,
  "zenMode.fullScreen": false,
  "editor.cursorWidth": 3,
  "workbench.editor.enablePreview": false,
  "editor.guides.highlightActiveIndentation": "always",
  "scm.diffDecorationsGutterAction": "none",
  "scm.diffDecorationsGutterPattern": {
    "modified": false
  },
  "testing.gutterEnabled": false,
  "scm.diffDecorationsGutterWidth": 5,
  "scm.diffDecorationsGutterVisibility": "hover",
  "scm.diffDecorations": "none",
  "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
  "files.autoSave": "off",
  "editor.smoothScrolling": false,
  "breadcrumbs.enabled": false,
  "vim.autoindent": false,
  "editor.tabSize": 2,
  "editor.insertSpaces": false,
  "[html]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.html-language-features"
  },
  "workbench.editor.tabActionCloseVisibility": false,
  "explorer.confirmDragAndDrop": false,
  "git.enableStatusBarSync": false,
  "workbench.tree.enableStickyScroll": false,
  "editor.stickyScroll.scrollWithEditor": false,
  "telemetry.telemetryLevel": "off",
  "editor.stickyScroll.enabled": false,
  "window.density.editorTabHeight": "compact",
  "window.commandCenter": false,
  "workbench.layoutControl.enabled": false,
  "window.customTitleBarVisibility": "never",
  "window.titleBarStyle": "native",
  "editor.cursorBlinking": "solid",
  "editor.wordWrap": "on",
  "window.menuBarVisibility": "toggle",
  "window.zoomLevel": -3,
  "editor.formatOnSave": false,
  "[javascript]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode"
  },
  "[javascriptreact]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode"
  },
  "javascript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabled": "always",
  "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.windows": "Command Prompt",
  "[jsonc]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode"
  },
  "vs-browser.localProxyServer.port": 3000,
  "zenMode.showTabs": "none",
  "workbench.colorTheme": "Tokyo Night Light",

  // Ignore node modules folder
  "files.exclude": {
    "node_modules": true
  },
  "search.exclude": {
    "node_modules": true
  }
}
"}
